name: BajajSmartElectricals
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Keeping your home and family safe is much simpler nowadays with smart home technology.
To modernize any home, Bajaj Electricals has introduced an IoT solution known as ‘Bajaj Smart" Automation System that will control lighting, climate, entertainment systems, and appliances. When connected to the internet, this smart automation system guarantees a connected life.

What will it offer:

Let you control multiple devices with a single app.
Create perfect ambience for any celebratory occasions.
Turn off your lights or turn your favorite Scene, mood , at the tap of your smartphone.
Thanks to its Voice Control feature, now control any gadgets via Alexa Echo devices.
You can also share devices among family members.

Bajaj will update the smart solution on a regular basis for a hassle-free consumer experience.

Enjoy your smart life after connecting Alexa to your Bajaj Smart products in a few simple steps:
1.Download “Bajaj Smart” App and register an account;
2.Configure some devices on “Bajaj Smart” App;
3.Download Amazon "Alexa" app and configure Echo with "Alexa" app;
4.Search "Bajaj Smart Electricals" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category;
5.Click Enable skill, and you will be navigated to login page;
6.Follow the instructions on the page to complete linking, you'll be redirect to the success page;
7.Now all setup is finished.
You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
“Alexa, turn on the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, turn off the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, set the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa, brighten the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa, dim the bedroom light to 50%.”
"Alexa, set bedroom light to green."
